data.comment: The match has started at Allianz Field.
Free kick for Salt Lake in the half of Minnesota.
In the minute 19, Minnesota have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Minnesota close to the penalty box.
In the minute 26, Drew Fischer awards the away team a throw-in.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
Salt Lake needs to be cautious. Minnesota have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 32, Pablo Ruiz for Salt Lake has been booked by Drew Fischer and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick Minnesota.
Drew Fischer signals a Minnesota throw-in in Salt Lake's half.
In the minute 34, Drew Fischer signals a throw-in for Salt Lake, close to Minnesota's area.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Allianz Field, Salt Lake are penalized for being offside.
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 37, At Allianz Field, Romain Metanire has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Salt Lake.
In the minute 40, Emanuel Reynoso for Minnesota gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Salt Lake at Allianz Field.
Salt Lake to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
In the minute 44, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
Minnesota have a dangerous throw-in.
Minnesota are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 56, Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Minnesota in the half of Salt Lake.
In the minute 58, Minnesota's Robin Lod gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Salt Lake in Saint Paul.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Salt Lake's Aaron Herrera breaks free at Allianz Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Drew Fischer awards Minnesota a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Can Minnesota get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
In Saint Paul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Paul.
In the minute 67, Freddy Juarez (Salt Lake) is making a first substitution, with Sam Johnson replacing Douglas Martinez.
Free kick Minnesota.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Paul.
In the minute 69, Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Minnesota's Chase Gasper misses with an attempt on goal.
Drew Fischer awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
Can Salt Lake capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Minnesota's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Salt Lake in Saint Paul.
In the minute 72, Goal kick for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
Can Minnesota capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Salt Lake's half?
In Saint Paul Minnesota drive forward through Jan Gregus. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 75, Drew Fischer signals a Minnesota throw-in in Salt Lake's half.
Marlon Hairston is replacing Jacori Hayes for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
Jeizon Ramirez is on a sub for Justin Meram for Salt Lake.
In the minute 78, The away team have replaced Damir Kreilach with Kyle Beckerman. This is the third substitution made today by Freddy Juarez.
Salt Lake are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Minnesota.
In the minute 83, Corner awarded to Minnesota.
Throw-in for Salt Lake close to the penalty box.
In the minute 85, In Saint Paul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Justen Glad (Salt Lake) has received a yellow card from Drew Fischer.
Throw-in Salt Lake.
Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
In the minute 87, Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Bakaye Dibassy hits the bar with a header! Very nearly a goal there for Minnesota in Saint Paul.
Salt Lake have a goal kick.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Minnesota in the half of Salt Lake.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
Drew Fischer will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Free kick for Minnesota in the half of Salt Lake.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Paul.
Marlon Hairston has recovered and rejoins the match in Saint Paul.
Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
Drew Fischer awards the home team a throw-in.
The match has come to a close in Saint Paul. The final score is 0-0.
Donny Toia is replacing Maikel Chang for the away team.
The match at Allianz Field has been interrupted briefly for a check on Marlon Hairston, who is down injured.
